pullrequest.title: Logging Part 5: Record ignition transport topics

content.raw:
This function provides the implementation of `Recorder::AddTopic(~)`, so the documentation of that public API function is identical to the documentation of this implementation function.

I've noticed a recurring issue with Gazebo doxygen where the documentation of a function does not get updated after changes are made to the function. I think this issue would be greatly exacerbated if we duplicated the documentation between the public API functions and the internal implementation function. By referencing the public API function documentation instead of copy/pasting it, my hope is to apply the DRY principle to our documentation and minimize issues of documentation falling out of sync.
